column4: Hi guys, I just d/led 6.06 Server and hit "Install to Hard Disk" when the CD booted and it gives me "Err=2, Invalid Compressed Format" when it tries to decompress the kernel.  Any ideas?
There weren't any errors on download... came in smoothly on a 10megabit line...
But I guess I'll re-download and re-burn
- does sound like a duff download, unfortunately.  have you checked the md5 checksum?
